bikebox.title: JUHUU BikeBox
bikebox.text: The JUHUU BikeBox is a bicycle box controlled via the JUHUU app, which enables the theft-proof parking of the bike. In contrast to conventional bicycle parks, the BikeBox offers complete protection against theft of all bicycle components as well as environmental influences and vandalism.
